text: Drillia siebenrocki is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Drilliidae. Tucker, J.K. 2004 Catalog of recent and fossil turrids (Mollusca: Gastropoda). Zootaxa 682:1–1295 ==Description== ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Red Sea ==References== * Tippett D.L. (2006a) Taxonomic notes on some Indo-Pacific and West African Drillia species (Conoidea: Drillidae). Iberus, 24, 13-21 ==External links== * * Janssen, Ronald, and Marco Taviani. "Taxonomic, ecological and historical considerations on the deep-water benthic mollusc fauna of the Red Sea." The Red Sea. Springer Berlin Heidelberg, 2015. 511-529. siebenrocki Category:Gastropods described in 1900
title: Drillia siebenrocki
